prologue.name: The Awakening
prologue.description: Arius awakens in the Arcanum Sanctum, drawn by mysterious visions.

start.text: You awaken in the Arcanum Sanctum, the ancient seat of magical knowledge. Visions of a fractured Veil haunt your dreams, and a sense of urgency fills your being. The air crackles with untamed magic, and you know your journey as a Seeker has begun.

examine_sanctum.text: The Sanctum's ancient halls are lined with magical artifacts and glowing crystals. You notice strange fluctuations in the magical energy around you, confirming your visions of the Veil's instability.

choices.text: Continue to find the Elder Magus

find_elder.text: You find Elder Magus Thalor in his study, surrounded by ancient tomes. His weathered face shows concern as he looks up from his reading.

meditation.text: As you meditate, the visions become clearer. You see rifts in the Veil, dark forces gathering, and the need for a Seeker to restore balance.

investigate_magic.text: The magical fluctuations lead you to a hidden chamber. Ancient runes glow with power, and you sense the presence of something... otherworldly.

share_visions.text: Elder Thalor listens intently to your visions. His eyes widen with recognition. 'The Veil is indeed fracturing,' he says. 'You must begin your training immediately.'

ask_history.text: The Elder tells you of the Sanctum's ancient purpose - to train Seekers who can navigate the Veil and maintain balance between worlds.

focus_rifts.text: Your magical senses reveal the true nature of the rifts - they are tears in reality itself, growing larger with each passing moment.

accept_training.text: Elder Thalor nods approvingly. 'The first trial awaits you in the Chamber of Elements. Prove your worth, and you shall begin your journey as a Seeker.'

ask_about_veil.text: The Elder explains that the Veil is the barrier between worlds, and its fracturing threatens all of existence. Only Seekers can traverse and repair it.

study_runes.text: The runes speak of ancient prophecies - of a Seeker who will restore the Veil. You feel a deep connection to these words.

choices.text: Return to the Elder with this knowledge

chapter_1.name: The First Trials
chapter_1.description: Begin your training as a Seeker and face the first challenges.

start.text: You stand before the Chamber of Elements, the first trial of the Sanctum. The air hums with elemental energy as you prepare to prove your worth as a Seeker.

trial_chamber.text: Inside the chamber, three elemental orbs float before you - fire, water, and earth. Each pulses with power, waiting for you to choose your path.

fire_trial.text: Flames dance around you as you channel the power of fire. The heat is intense, but you feel a connection to the raw energy of creation.

water_trial.text: Cool water flows through your being as you channel its power. You feel the fluidity and adaptability of water magic.

earth_trial.text: The solid strength of earth fills you as you channel its power. You feel grounded and unshakeable.

fire_mastery.text: You have mastered the flames! Fire magic now flows through you with ease. The Elder appears, impressed by your control.

water_mastery.text: You have mastered the flow of water! Water magic now responds to your will. The Elder appears, impressed by your adaptability.

earth_mastery.text: You have mastered the strength of earth! Earth magic now anchors your power. The Elder appears, impressed by your stability.

next_trial.text: The Elder leads you to the Chamber of Knowledge, where you must prove your understanding of the Veil and its mysteries.

knowledge_trial.text: Ancient texts and magical diagrams surround you. The Elder asks you to demonstrate your understanding of the Veil's nature.

choices.text: Explain the Veil as a barrier between worlds
Describe the Veil as a living entity

knowledge_success.text: The Elder nods approvingly. 'You have shown both magical aptitude and understanding. You are ready to begin your journey as a Seeker.'

seeker_awakening.text: As you accept your role, you feel a new awareness awaken within you. The Veil's presence becomes clear, and you sense the other worlds waiting beyond.
